name: Polar Weirdhouse
description:
"Dear Santa"

It's that time of the year, when Santa's workshop is flooded with letters starting with that all-too-familiar phrase. Except, it isn't Santa who is in charge anymore.

Ever since the e-commerce company "Polar" took over, things haven't been the same in the North Pole. Cosy workshops have been replaced by cold warehouses, and elves are worked to the bone to wrap presents in order meet ever increasing demands.

However, it may not be too late...

Play as Tiny Grumples, a rebellious elf who aims to give everyone the exact opposite of what they asked for. 

Will you help ruin Polar's reputation and save Christmas?

Controls

WASD: Movement

Space: Pick up/drop item

Pick the opposite item from the list and wrap & send it!

By Adam Cowell, Alexis Sarmiento, Hayley Royston, Craig Gibbs

Built in Unity
